_header: Woe is me woe is me for love I go I-bounden
Note: Cited in Latin prose, ‘Miscellanea et Sermones super Evangelia’
Subjects: Christ, suffering of; Christ, love to sinners
_description: Allusion to a song in a sermon on Christ’s suffering love — one line

CULFf117.Transcription: Wo is me wo is me for loue y go ibunden
